High range Hospital if you didn't have Insurance
the emergency  is fair comparing service vs to the price. the outpatient clinic Accepts health insurance but needs to be more organized although after there new renovation its always crowded and you need to pay attention when they are calling you to enter for your visit.
regarding the operation and nursing its almost very good.
About the intensive care:
Is not so good (3 stars) also the icu visitor lobby in the first floor is so bad there is no enough chairs and sofas for icu visitors and the lobby coffee bar is so bad called (zino) is more expensive than on the run :).....it serve the most worst taste drinks.with so expensive rate and the lounge is not clean and  hygiene as to represent a hospital.
Parking:
is so expensive if you use the smart card if they ran out of cards the bay 15 ponds ticket for the whole day. Smart cards are so expensive
Also there is no grid lines drawn for safety and avoid space wasting.
Dentistry: not recommended at all.very expensive compared with any other place .
